definitions.definition: That captures; especially, (of an argument, words etc.) designed to capture or entrap in misleading arguments; sophistical .
Having a disposition to find fault unreasonably or to raise petty objections ; cavilling , nitpicky .

main_definition: ( obsolete ) That captures; especially, (of an argument, words etc.) designed to capture or entrap in misleading arguments; sophistical .
secondary_definitions: Having a disposition to find fault unreasonably or to raise petty objections ; cavilling , nitpicky .
